title: NEW! Elevator doorman building on Charles River
posting_body: The Charlesview is a totally renovated elevator building on riverside Beacon Street including doorman services.

This crisp one bedroom on fourth floor features amazing Charles River views, lots of windows, hardwood floors in living area, central air, open fully-applianced kitchen with large breakfast bar, good closet space, renovated bathroom, resident doorman and large clean laundry area.
Steps to Charles River esplanade, MBTA & bus stops, Newbury Street restaurants and cafes and everything in Back Bay.
First months rent, last months rent and one month rental fee of $2500.
Please call Franklin Knotts to preview/details @ 617-365-1151
